name: Building A Ship Home
description:
Travel back to your home planet by constructing your ship.  You'll need to keep track of the ammo and fuel used as you battle enemy fighters on your way home.

Controls:

  • 'A' or 'Left Arrow' to move left
  • 'D' or 'Right Arrow' to move right
  • 'Space Bar' to fire your laser

Made for Weekly Game Jam - Week 129: Lost in Space
